primary.base: bg-gradient-to-r from-amber-500 to-amber-600 text-white font-semibold transition-all duration-200 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl

product.container: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden group
product.title: font-semibold text-slate-800 line-clamp-2 mb-1

modal.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm z-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4
modal.container: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl max-w-4xl w-full max-h-[90vh] overflow-hidden
modal.header: flex items-center justify-between p-6 border-b border-slate-200

input.base: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-lg transition-colors

select.base: px-4 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-lg transition-colors

uploadArea.base: border-2 border-dashed rounded-xl p-8 text-center transition-colors cursor-pointer

header.container: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200 sticky top-0 z-50

logo.icon: bg-gradient-to-br from-amber-500 to-amber-600 p-2 rounded-xl shadow-lg
logo.subtitle: text-sm text-slate-500

loading.spinner: w-12 h-12 border-4 border-amber-200 rounded-full animate-spin
loading.overlay: absolute top-0 left-0 w-12 h-12 border-4 border-transparent border-t-amber-500 rounded-full animate-spin

alerts.error: p-4 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg flex items-center space-x-3
alerts.success: p-4 bg-green-50 border border-green-200 rounded-lg flex items-center space-x-3
alerts.warning: p-4 bg-amber-50 border border-amber-200 rounded-lg flex items-center space-x-3
alerts.info: p-4 bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 rounded-lg flex items-center space-x-3

progress.bar: bg-gradient-to-r from-amber-500 to-amber-600 h-2 rounded-full transition-all duration-300

tags.category: bg-amber-100 text-amber-800 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-full
tags.material: bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-full

status.inStock: bg-green-100 text-green-800 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-full
status.outOfStock: bg-red-100 text-red-800 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-full

productActions.container: absolute top-3 right-3 flex flex-col space-y-2 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity

imageNavigation.button: absolute top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-black/50 text-white p-1 rounded-full opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity
imageNavigation.indicators: absolute bottom-2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 flex space-x-1

stockStatus.container: absolute inset-0 bg-black/50 flex items-center justify-center
stockStatus.badge: bg-red-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-semibold

grid.products: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6
